title: How do I permanently disable the pop ups hints? The ones that you have to tap "Got it." to dismiss.
content:
I just got my phone a few days ago and I keep getting pop ups that are supposed to be helpful but I already know how to use a Pixel, so all it does is create an extra step when I go to use my phone and I have to stop and click "Got it." or "No thanks." on a pop up. How do I get it to leave me alone?

I have googled everything I can think of on how to turn off pixel hints or tips, but I am at a loss since I don't actually know what the feature is called.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
